name: copy-url-extension
description: Copy the URL and title to the clipboard
author: Ian Bicking

scripts.build:md:manifest: node -e 'let input = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync("package.json")); input.version = input.version.slice(0, -1) + Math.floor((Date.now() - new Date(new Date().getFullYear().toString()).getTime()) / 3600000); input.version_name = `${input.version} ${process.env.NODE_ENV === "prod" ? "release" : "dev"}`; console.log(JSON.stringify(input))' | mustache - addon-md/manifest.json.tmpl > addon-md/manifest.json
scripts.build:html:manifest: node -e 'let input = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync("package.json")); input.version = input.version.slice(0, -1) + Math.floor((Date.now() - new Date(new Date().getFullYear().toString()).getTime()) / 3600000); input.version_name = `${input.version} ${process.env.NODE_ENV === "prod" ? "release" : "dev"}`; console.log(JSON.stringify(input))' | mustache - addon-html/manifest.json.tmpl > addon-html/manifest.json
scripts.package:md: NODE_ENV=prod npm-run-all build:md:* xpi:md:* && cp web-ext-artifacts/`ls -t1 web-ext-artifacts | head -n 1` addon-md.xpi
scripts.package:html: NODE_ENV=prod npm-run-all build:html* xpi:html:* && cp web-ext-artifacts/`ls -t1 web-ext-artifacts | head -n 1` addon-html.xpi
scripts.run:md: mkdir -p ./Profile && npm run build:md:manifest && web-ext run --source-dir=addon-md -p ./Profile --browser-console --keep-profile-changes -f ${FIREFOX:-nightly}
scripts.run:html: mkdir -p ./Profile && npm run build:html:manifest && web-ext run --source-dir=addon-html -p ./Profile --browser-console --keep-profile-changes -f ${FIREFOX:-nightly}
